General.Name: Poalim Ibi
General.Description: Poalim I.B.I.-Managing & Underwriting Ltd operates as an investment banking company. The company engages in the issuance of issues for corporations seeking to raise capital and debt in the capital market; management of issues, including distribution and management of consortium underwriters for issues of companies offering securities to the public; deals in brokerage of securities; and management of private issues of companies to institutional investors. Poalim I.B.I.-Managing & Underwriting Ltd was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.

1.Name: Mr. Dirt  Greenbaum
1.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of IBI Underwriting Ltd

2.Title: Deputy Chief Exec. Officer of IBI Underwriting Ltd
